Description: nflverse identifier for games. Format is season, week, away_team, home_team
Legacy NFL game ID.
Numeric play id that when used with game_id and drive provides the unique identifier for a single play.
String abbreviation for the team with possession.
Formation the offense lines up in to snap the ball.
The positions of the offensive personnel lined up on the field for a play.
Number of defensive players lined up in the box at the snap.
The positions of the defensive personnel lined up on the field for a play.
Number of defensive player who rushed the passer.
A list of every player on the field for the play, by gsis_id
A list of every offensive player on the field for the play, by gsis_id
A list of every defensive player on the field for the play, by gsis_id
Number of offensive players on the field for the play
Number of defensive players on the field for the play

Legacy column. For 2023 and prior years, reflects the distance (in yards) that the ball traveled in the air on a given passing play as tracked by NGS. Is NA for 2024 on--we advise instead using the air_yards column from nflreadr::load_pbp() moving forward.
Duration (in seconds) between the time of the ball being snapped and the time of release of a pass attempt
A boolean indicating whether or not the QB was pressured on a play

A string indicating the route the primary receiver on a play took. Has the following possible values: "CORNER", "DEEP OUT", "GO", "HITCH/CURL", "IN/DIG", "POST", "QUICK OUT", "SCREEN", "SHALLOW CROSS/DRAG", "SLANT", "SWING", "TEXAS/ANGLE", "WHEEL".
A string indicating whether the defense was in man or zone coverage on a play

A string indicating what type of cover the defense was in on a play. Has one of the following values: "COVER_0", "COVER_1", "COVER_2", "2_MAN", "COVER_3", "COVER_4", "COVER_6", "COVER_9", "COMBO", "BLOWN".
A string listing all of the names of offensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in offense_players.
A string listing all of the names of defensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in defense_players.
A string listing all of the positions of offensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in offense_players.
A string listing all of the positions of defensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in defense_players.
A string listing all of the numbers of offensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in offense_players.
A string listing all of the numbers of defensive players in the order of their gsis_ids in defense_players.
